column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Today was my first time visiting turns out most bakeries
column2: sweet shops in Houston close early
column3: and Common Bond Bistro don't so we arrived 30 or less minutes before closing even if they were already cleaning and picking up chairs
column4: the staff was super polite and still let us sit down anyway
column5: we didn't stay we just waited for our drink and left.
